column2: (progn (setq vm-case-watch-events nil) (fset 'vm-case-watch-rec (lambda (symbol newval operation where) (setq vm-case-watch-events (cons (list symbol newval operation where) vm-case-watch-events)))) (add-variable-watcher 'vm-case-watch-new 'vm-case-watch-rec) (defvaralias 'vm-case-watch-new 'vm-case-watch-old) (nreverse vm-case-watch-events))
